briefTitle: The Effect of Oral PhenazopyrIdine on Perioperative Voiding After Mid-urethral sliNg (EPIPhANy Study)
officialTitle: The Effect of Oral phenazopyrIdine on Perioperative Voiding After Mid-urethral Sling
summary: Randomized clinical trial using phenazopyridine to decrease voiding dysfunction after a retropubic midurethral sling operation.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With a Failed Voiding Trial
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Postoperatively, up to 3 days after surgery
